name: ScrollKit – Nice Scrollbar
author: ModinaTheme

sections.description:
Nice and Awesome Scrollbar for Web Site.

Plugin Features

Easy to install
Fully integrated in WordPress
Simple installation & activation
Unlimited colors.
CSS3 animation.
Supported touch devices.
All browser supported
Custom Width.
Scrollbar border radius.
Scrollbar scroll speed.
Scrollbar border.
Auto Hide Enable/Disable Mode.
Lightweight Responsive.
Easy Option Panel

Demo Link of this plugin: Live Demo

Top Featured

  1. Color Change Option
  2. Plugin Option Panel
  3. Light Weight Plugin
  4. Modern UI Colors
sections.installation:
Download and Install. Then Use it. Easy ðŸ˜€

  1. Upload scroll-kit.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to Scroll Kit Menu
  4. Change Color with your’s
  5. Use it and Enjoy.
